General.Name: Asuransi Bintang Tbk
General.Description: PT Asuransi Bintang Tbk engages in the general and reinsurance insurance business in Indonesia. The company offers fire, vehicle, personal, accident, health, terrorism and sabotage, natural disaster, engineering, marine cargo, hull, and motor vehicle insurance products. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Fatmawati Hospital No.32, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12430
